content: a welcome addition to the nursery this cuddly crochet blanket is a beginner project that looks a lot more advanced than it is stitched in bernat baby blanket frosting a soothing ripple pattern works up quickly using this soft and cushy yarn learn single_crochet in the back loop with simple increases and decreases to create the textured chevron shaping instructions include the charted pattern for easy visual reference materials bernat® baby blanket™ frosting™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m cozy rosie 61001 2 balls or 440 yds/402 m measurements approx 38 x 42 96 5 x 106 5 cm
